text: smushed corner, splitting seams, components excellent.
rankings 67th best game 2022 60th best game 2023 61st best game 2024

samurai is a good game, but it's not a fun game. with both babylonia and caesar out now, i see no reason to go back to samurai - although i might just for completion's sake at some point. i have only played at 2p and would like to try it at 3p. at 2p, i would rather play pretty much any no luck abstract over this as the randomness feels arbitrary and swingy. overrated (at least at 2).
